ai-thag2.46:1.2_0: their lovely blue necks and fair faces, their beautiful song and their call.
ai-thag2.46:1.3_0: This broad earth is lush with grass and dew,
ai-thag2.46:1.4_0: and the sky is full of beautiful clouds.
ai-thag2.46:2.1_0: One practicing absorption is happy in mind, and their appearance is uplifting;
ai-thag2.46:2.2_0: going forth in the teaching of the Buddha is easy for a good person.
ai-thag2.46:2.3_0: You should realize that supreme, unchanging state,
ai-thag2.46:2.4_0: so very pure, subtle, and hard to see.
